title: Control
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>*Stare*~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What is it, Kasumi-san? Is there something on my face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin was just thinking how the glasses you wear while you’re Nana-senpai looks nice, Setsuna-senpai.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>My glasses?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>How do you think Kasumin will look with glasses on? Would Kasumin look cute? Of course Kasumin would.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>....Fufu, you’re right. Okay, I’ll lend you my glasses if you can solve this math problem.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Gueeeh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I really want to see how cute you are with a pair of glasses, Kasumi-san. Would you show it to me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>! W-, well, it can’t be helped if you wanted to see it so badly! Kasumin will solve this one in no time~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fight on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
